snippet: Children learn much more than the three R’s at the unconventional institutions in these novels.
abstract: Jennifer M Brown reviews children's books Ms. Rapscott's Girls by Elise Primavera and The Girl With the Glass Bird by Esme Kerr.
lead_paragraph: Children learn much more than the three R’s at the unconventional institutions in these novels.

headline.main: ‘Ms. Rapscott’s Girls’ and ‘The Girl With the Glass Bird’
